Posts.Content: You could try a company called Nicola Jane (www.nicolajane.com) specifically for ladies who have had mastectomy. Hope its of some help X
Posts.Title: Post Surgery Bras!!

Posts.Content: Hi Celia,                Fab news.And just what i needed to hear,my mum is still in middle of treatment for her breast cancer.And positive news is what we want to hear. Love and Hugs Thank You X
Posts.Title: ALL CLEAR
